title: FS: C. 1920's Hockey Real Photo Postcards. Ojibway Indian Hockey Team! "SOLD"
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: C. 1920's Hockey Real Photo Postcards. Ojibway Indian Hockey Team! "SOLD"
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
I have two fantastic hockey RPPC's for sale. The first is a C.1920's Temagami Ojibway Indian Team RPPC. It's in rough shape but I've never seen another postcard with content like this. The second postcard is a C. 1920's Real Photo Postcard of an unidentified player (CNE Team) with a Desjardins, Sorel P.Q. Stamp on the front.

SOLD
Feel free to make an offer on these fine postcards!
